channel.title: CVE Feed for AMI -- AptioV
channel.description: The latest CVEs for AMI -- AptioV

item.title: CVE-2023-34469|2024-08-02T16:10:07.115Z -- ami -- aptiov
item.description: AMI AptioV contains a vulnerability in BIOS where an Attacker may use an improper access control via the physical network. A successful exploit of this vulnerability may lead to a loss of confidentiality.Â

item.title: CVE-2023-34470|2024-08-02T16:10:07.203Z -- ami -- aptiov
item.description: AMI AptioV contains a vulnerability in BIOS where an Attacker may use an improper access control via the local network. A successful exploit of this vulnerability may lead to a loss of confidentiality, integrity and availability.
